charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1101_01:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was hiking
up a mountain, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Teddy
and Rellor.
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_02:
Oho! If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I see you’re doing some hiking, too.
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_0401_04:
Ga ha ha! You must be talking about Rellor’s
mud ball!
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_0402_06: Hey, that’s no Nugget! It’s Rellor’s mud ball!
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_07:
I’ve learned a lot about Rellor,
so let me explain!
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_08:
Rellor creates a mud ball by mixing sand
and dirt with psychic energy!
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_09:
It rolls its mud ball around while the energy
it needs for Evolution matures. However...
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_10:
For some reason, different-colored Rellor
create a mud ball that turns gold!
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_11:
When Rellor evolves, it becomes a Pokémon
called Rabsca.
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_12:
But when different-colored Rabsca evolve,
their body turns gold instead of their mud
ball! Fascinating, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_13:
I’ve never seen this Pokémon on my usual
trails, so it’s been fun just observing it.
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_0401_15:
I got him from a Paldean Trainer I bumped
into on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_0402_17:
Actually, I didn’t. I got him from a Paldean
Trainer I recently bumped into!
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_19:
I’d love to visit Paldea one day and hike up
a mountain with Rellor!
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_20:
I guess a famous mountain in Paldea would be
Glaseado Mountain?
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_21:
Apparently it gets pretty snowy up there.
I better be prepared.
charaepi_ch0364_00_masahito/2301_1201_22:
When that time comes, let’s climb to the top
together, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
